page.title: 17WIDNES AMENITIES (1)
page.content: { WIDNES LIBRARY}It has{50,556 books and{18,716 members.}The adult fine for overdue books is 6p per day and 2p per book for children. The most popular book is the novel. The library has 11 staff altogether. It opened in{1895 and specialises in Railway History. { HALTON COLLEGE OF FURTHER EDUCATION} It has the following{dept._Business and{General Education, Catering, {Hairdressing, Arts, Engg.Technology, {Engg. and Building Crafts, Pre {Vocation, Community Studies, Science and{Mathematics.}3000 students receive part time education. That means they attend one day and one evening. The college was officially opened in September{1961}but the laboratories and workshops were opened in{1958. Class size_minimum 10, maximum 20. Uniforms are only worn for Hotel reception, Hairdressing and Catering.
